g.text: Enterprise Banking System with Istio Service Mesh, Keycloak, LDAP & Party Data Management

- TLS Termination (TLS 1.3)
- OAuth2.1 Token Validation
- FAPI Compliance Headers
- Circuit Breaker Patterns
- Rate Limiting & DDoS Protection
- Load Balancing with Health Checks

- Service Discovery
- Traffic Routing Rules
- Resilience Policies
- Configuration Distribution

- Certificate Management
- mTLS Encryption
- Service-to-Service Auth
- Zero Trust Security

- Request Routing
- Metrics Collection
- Distributed Tracing
- Security Policies
